---
title: "Australian Financial Stability Monitor"
output: 
  flexdashboard::flex_dashboard:
    orientation: columns
    vertical_layout: fill
    theme: cosmo
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# This chunk loads your libraries and fetches the data silently
library(flexdashboard)
library(readrba)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

# Fetching the Cash Rate
cash_rate_data <- read_rba(series_id = "FIRMMCRID")
```

Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### RBA Cash Rate (Interbank Overnight)


```{r}
# This chunk draws the plot in the dashboard column
cash_rate_data %>%
  filter(date >= as.Date("2006-01-01")) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = date, y = value)) +
  geom_line(color = "#0055A4", linewidth = 1) + 
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(
    x = "",
    y = "Interest Rate (%)",
    caption = "Source: RBA Table F1"
  ) +
  theme(
    plot.title = element_blank(), 
    panel.grid.minor = element_blank()
  )
```

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### AUD/USD Exchange Rate

```{r}
# 1. Fetch the exchange rate data
aud_usd_data <- read_rba(series_id = "FXRUSD")

# 2. Draw the plot
aud_usd_data %>%
  filter(date >= as.Date("2006-01-01")) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = date, y = value)) +
  geom_line(color = "#E03C31", linewidth = 1) + # RBA Red
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(
    x = "",
    y = "USD per 1 AUD",
    caption = "Source: RBA Table F11"
  ) +
  theme(
    plot.title = element_blank(), 
    panel.grid.minor = element_blank()
  )
